name: iot-device-logger
description: Logs sensor data and events from IoT devices.

resources.name: device-reading
resources.description: A single data point or event logged by an IoT device.

fields.name: deviceId
fields.description: Unique identifier for the IoT device sending the reading.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: Unix timestamp in milliseconds when the reading was recorded.

fields.name: readingType
fields.description: Type of sensor reading or event (e.g., 'temperature', 'humidity', 'batteryLevel', 'status').

fields.name: value
fields.description: The measured value for the readingType.

fields.name: unit
fields.description: Unit of measurement for the value (e.g., 'C', '%', 'Pa', 'V').

fields.name: location
fields.description: Geographical location of the device at the time of reading.
